analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/29/0x52dae2b2573d36a339dc1ddcbd726f06c428d652.sol:
	Contract VNDCToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/29/0x52dae2b2573d36a339dc1ddcbd726f06c428d652.sol#358-360)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/29/0x52dae2b2573d36a339dc1ddcbd726f06c428d652.sol#118-120) is not in mixedCase
